casebody.data:
No. 09-1233. Edmund G. Brown, Jr., Governor of California, et al., Appellants v. Marciano Plata, et al. 563 U.S. 972, 131 S. Ct. 2895,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1185,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3418. May 2, 2011.

Motion of appellants for leave to file a supplemental brief after argument granted. Motion of appellees for leave to file a supplemental brief after argument granted.
